name: autocomplete
description: Feature flag to enable place autocomplete.

name: biomed_nl
description: Enables the biomed_nl experimental features by registering the experiments/biomed_nl api and html routes.

name: factcheck_redirect
description: Feature flag to redirect the Fact Check page to the new ClaimReview page.

name: follow_up_questions_experiment
description: Enables the follow up questions generated from related topics as an experiment.

name: follow_up_questions_ga
description: Enables the follow up questions generated from related topics to general audience.

name: metadata_modal
description: Feature flag to show the complete metadata modal. If not set, the older modal will be used as a fallback.

name: page_overview_experiment
description: Enables the page overview generated from query and relevant stat vars as an experiment.

name: page_overview_ga
description: Makes the page overview feature, generated from query and relevant stat vars, generally available.

name: standardized_vis_tool
description: Enables standardized visualization tool UI for the /tool/map, /tool/scatter, and /tool/timeline pages

name: stat_var_autocomplete_search_bar
description: Enable stat var autocompletion in the NL Search bar

name: vai_for_statvar_search
description: Enables using the Vertex AI search application for stat var searches.

name: vai_medium_relevance_threshold
description: Enables setting the relevance threshold to "MEDIUM" for Vertex AI stat var search application.
